channel.title: Error Loading Block Database
channel.description:
My system has the following specifications
QT Wallet 3.0.2.0 Operating System and version: Windows 10
Hello, I was synchronising the blockchain since a few days. My computer was down, so I opened it again. Now when I launch the QT Wallet, it starts by loading the index block, then I have the message "Error Loading Block Database".
Anything I can do ?

item.title: Error Loading Block Database
item.dc:creator: @Joseph Joseph
item.description:
@Joseph wrote:

My system has the following specifications

QT Wallet 3.0.2.0
Operating System and version: Windows 10

Hello,
I was synchronising the blockchain since a few days. My computer was down, so I opened it again.
Now when I launch the QT Wallet, it starts by loading the index block, then I have the message “Error Loading Block Database”.

Anything I can do ?

Read full topic
